div.p: The Pharmaceutical Advice document is a document in which health professionals track important observations (with the explicit consent of the patient), in regards to medication use (ONE).

div.li: IHE Pharmacy Profil: PADV (Pharmacy Pharmaceutical Advice)

div.p: This exchange format is defined as a document type that corresponds to a Bundle as a FHIR resource. A Bundle has alist of entries. The first entry is the Composition, in which all contained entries are then referenced.
